trustfund:
TF093015-NILE BASIN INITIATIVE
            INSTITUTIONAL STRENGTHENING PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Nile Basin Initiative Institutional
            Strengthening Project (ISP) for Africa has strengthened
            foundation for institutional sustainability, enhanced
            capacity, and harmonized corporate management to more
            effectively deliver programs and projects. The NBI is in the
            process of developing a plan for institutional and financial
            sustainability to ensure its continuation after the
            completion of the ISP and more broadly after the completion
            of the Nile Basin Trust Fund (NBI's primary source of
            funding).  The restructuring is intended to ensure
            satisfactory achievement of the project development
            objective of institutional and financial sustainability of
            the NBI institutions after project closure. The successful
            delivery of the ISP is critical to the future of the NBI as
            an institution and their associated investment portfolio of
            over US$ 1 billion.
